import React, {useState} from "react"; import { Table } from "react-bootstrap"; import BoardPagination from "./Pagination"; function HistoryBoard(){ let histories = [ { date : "2022.07.06", sort : "결제", payment: "이체", product : "디폴릭 정품 반팔티", store : "이랜드", price : "11,500", status : "오류", }, { date : "2022.07.05", sort : "결제", payment: "머니", product : "디폴릭 정품 반팔티", store : "이랜드", price : "9,800", status : "정상", }, { date : "2022.07.05", sort : "충전", payment: "카드", product : "-", store : "-", price : "11,500", status : "오류", }, { date : "2022.07.03", sort : "충전", payment: "-", product : "-", store : "-", price : "9,800", status : "정상", }, ] let boardPerPage = 5; const totalPage = (histories.length / 5) + 1; const [nowPage, setNowPage] = useState(1); return( {histories.map((history, idx)=>{ return( ); })}

{history.date} {history.sort} {history.payment} {history.product} {history.store} {history.price} 원 {history.status}
); } export default HistoryBoard;
